name: BFL Wool and Sparkle Combed Top Hand Dyed 4oz "Sylvanas" BF23
description:
2 available immediately. Please allow 5 to 7 business days for dyeing larger amounts.

70% Blue Faced Leicester wool and 30% Firestar sparkle have been lightly combed together, resulting in skinny stripes of shimmer. The combed top was then transformed by the Yarn Geek herself in her Mad Scientist Lab o' Spiffy Colorification. 

She does her best to represent the colors accurately, but your monitor may display them slightly differently. You will receive FOUR OUNCES of fluffy, squishy,  wooly goodness.

Her secret lab is in an undisclosed dog friendly, non-smoking environment so please consider that before you make your purchase.

She does ship outside the USA. If you don't see your country listed, please contact her and she will look it up and get back to you ASAP. Shipping outside of the USA will not include shipping insurance. You will be responsible for any tariffs or taxes resulting from the import of yarn or spinning fiber into your country.

name: Superwash Merino Wool Cashmere Nylon Sock Top Hand Dyed 4oz Aegean Queen BNC 8
description:
3 available

Our own custom blend is so soft and spins like fluffy clouds of air. 75% Superwash Merino, 12.5% Cashmere and 12.5% Nylon top has been transformed by the Yarn Geek herself in her Mad Scientist Lab o' Spiffy Colorification.

"Why would we put these fibers together?" you might ask. We wanted to have softness, strength, durability and easy care all in one blend. We are all about  experimentation here, and we are confident you will enjoy the results.

She does her best to represent the colors accurately, but your monitor may display them slightly differently. You will receive FOUR OUNCES of fluffy, squishy,  wooly goodness. This is one braid of the two pictured.

Her secret lab is in an undisclosed dog and cat friendly, non-smoking environment so please consider that before you make your purchase.

She does ship outside the USA. If you don't see your country listed, please contact her and she will look it up and get back to you ASAP. Shipping outside of the USA will not include shipping insurance. You will be responsible for any tariffs or taxes resulting from the import of yarn or spinning fiber into your country.

name: Blue Faced Leicester BFL Wool Roving Hand Dyed 4oz Slice of Lemon BFL16
description:
1 available immediately. Please allow 5 to 7 business days for dyeing greater quantities. 

Blue Faced Leicester wool roving has been transformed by the Yarn Geek herself in her Mad Scientist Lab o' Spiffy Colorification. She chose the name "A Slice of Lemon Wrapped Around a Large Gold Brick", in honor of the often quoted Pan Galactic Gargleblaster of Hitchhiker's Guide fame.

She does her best to represent the colors accurately, but your monitor may display them slightly differently. You will receive one braid of FOUR OUNCES of fluffy, squishy,  wooly goodness.

Her secret lab is in an undisclosed dog and bunny friendly, non-smoking environment so please consider that before you make your purchase.

She does ship outside the USA. If you don't see your country listed, please contact her and she will look it up and get back to you ASAP. Shipping outside of the USA will not include shipping insurance. You will be responsible for any tariffs or taxes resulting from the import of yarn or spinning fiber into your country.
